User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://rifa-silverado.mx/sitemap.xml

# Specific instructions for search engines
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 1

User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 1

# Disallow unnecessary paths for crawlers
Disallow: /admin
Disallow: /test-supabase
Disallow: /compras-test
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /out/
Disallow: /dist/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /
Allow: /comprar
Allow: /terminos
Allow: /privacidad
